Chapter 40.40:10: Next, dedicate the altar and all its equipment by anointing it, and it will be completely holy.

Chapter 40.40:11: Also dedicate the washbasin and its base in the same way.

Chapter 40.40:12: “Bring Aaron and his sons to the entrance of the Tent, and have them take a ritual bath.

Chapter 40.40:13: Dress Aaron in the priestly garments, anoint him, and in this way consecrate him, so that he can serve me as priest.

Chapter 40.40:14: Bring his sons and put the shirts on them.

Chapter 40.40:15: Then anoint them, just as you anointed their father, so that they can serve me as priests. This anointing will make them priests for all time to come.”

Chapter 40.40:16: Moses did everything just as the Lord had commanded.

Chapter 40.40:17: So on the first day of the first month of the second year after they left Egypt, the Tent of the Lord's presence was set up.

Chapter 40.40:18: Moses put down its bases, set up its frames, attached its crossbars, and put up its posts.

Chapter 40.40:19: He spread out the covering over the Tent and put the outer covering over it, just as the Lord had commanded.

Chapter 40.40:20: Then he took the two stone tablets and put them in the Covenant Box. He put the poles in the rings of the Box and put the lid on it.

Chapter 40.40:21: Then he put the Box in the Tent and hung up the curtain. In this way he screened off the Covenant Box, just as the Lord had commanded.

Chapter 40.40:22: He put the table in the Tent, on the north side outside the curtain,

Chapter 40.40:23: and placed on it the bread offered to the Lord, just as the Lord had commanded.

Chapter 40.40:24: He put the lampstand in the Tent, on the south side, opposite the table,

Chapter 40.40:25: and there in the Lord's presence he lit the lamps, just as the Lord had commanded.

Chapter 40.40:26: He put the gold altar in the Tent, in front of the curtain,

Chapter 40.40:27: and burned the sweet-smelling incense, just as the Lord had commanded.

Chapter 40.40:28: He hung the curtain at the entrance of the Tent,

Chapter 40.40:29: and there in front of the curtain he placed the altar for burning offerings. On it he sacrificed the burnt offering and the grain offering, just as the Lord had commanded.

Chapter 40.40:30: He put the washbasin between the Tent and the altar and filled it with water.

Chapter 40.40:31: Moses, Aaron, and his sons washed their hands and their feet there

Chapter 40.40:32: whenever they went into the Tent or to the altar, just as the Lord had commanded.

Chapter 40.40:33: Moses set up the enclosure around the Tent and the altar and hung the curtain at the entrance of the enclosure. So he finished all the work.

Chapter 40.40:34: Then the cloud covered the Tent and the dazzling light of the Lord's presence filled it.

Chapter 40.40:35: Because of this, Moses could not go into the Tent.

Chapter 40.40:36: The Israelites moved their camp to another place only when the cloud lifted from the Tent.

Chapter 40.40:37: As long as the cloud stayed there, they did not move their camp.

Chapter 40.40:38: During all their wanderings they could see the cloud of the Lord's presence over the Tent during the day and a fire burning above it during the night.
